mapper.select: SELECT R.reception_id, R.doctor, R.treatment_reason, R.systolic, R.diastolic, R.blood_sugar, R.height, R.weight, R.bmi, P.patient_name, P.phone_number1, P.phone_number2, P.phone_number3, P.gender, P.zip_code, P.address, P.detail_address, P.insurance FROM Reception R , Patient P WHERE R.patient_id = P.patient_id

select r.reception_id, p.patient_id, p.patient_name, p.front_registration_number, r.doctor doctor_id, e.employee_name doctor_name, r.state, Receipt.receipt_id receipt_id from Reception r inner join Patient p on r.patient_id = p.patient_id inner join Employee e on r.doctor = e.employ_id left join Receipt on Receipt.reception_id = r.reception_id where DATE(r.created_at) = DATE(NOW()) order by r.created_at desc;

select r.reception_id, p.patient_id, p.patient_name, p.front_registration_number, r.doctor doctor_id, e.employee_name doctor_name, r.state, Receipt.receipt_id receipt_id from Reception r inner join Patient p on r.patient_id = p.patient_id inner join Employee e on r.doctor = e.employ_id left join Receipt on Receipt.reception_id = r.reception_id where r.reception_id = #{reception_id};
mapper.update: UPDATE Reception SET height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, bmi = #{bmi}, systolic= #{systolic}, diastolic = #{diastolic}, blood_sugar = #{blood_sugar}, treatment_reason = #{treatment_reason}, doctor = #{doctor} WHERE reception_id = #{reception_id} AND patient_id = #{patient_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reception ( doctor, treatment_reason, patient_id, systolic, diastolic, blood_sugar, height, weight, bmi, state )VALUES ( #{doctor}, #{treatment_reason}, #{patient_id}, #{systolic}, #{diastolic}, #{blood_sugar}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, "진료대기" )
